formattedAddress: E 47th St &, Park Ave, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: E 47th St &, Park Ave, New York, NY 10017, USA

editorialSummary.text: Cart serving coffee, bagels, omelets, donuts, sandwiches, and Greek eats, including vegan options.

originalText.text: Lovely delicious and affordable breakfast. Open from 4am, great for early risers. Highly recommend the breakfast combo for $7 you get egg cheese and meat sandwich, a donut and either a small coffee or juice or a banana. There's a lot of construction nearby so you might have to yell a bit to be heard over the noise. Mama Jo is sweet, I'll be back for sure.

text.text: Lovely delicious and affordable breakfast. Open from 4am, great for early risers. Highly recommend the breakfast combo for $7 you get egg cheese and meat sandwich, a donut and either a small coffee or juice or a banana. There's a lot of construction nearby so you might have to yell a bit to be heard over the noise. Mama Jo is sweet, I'll be back for sure.

originalText.text:
Told a friend I woke up at 4am jetlagged & hungry - he pointed me to Mama Jo's. And wow, what a gem! Mama Jo told me she's (xx) y/o (ok I can't remember the age she shared because I was still jetlagged but also because she looks waaaaaay younger than the number she mentioned so it did not register lol). & that she's been doing this for 45 years. ðŸ˜³ I commented - you must enjoy this so much & that must be the source of your youthful look! She then went on to share the most meaningful advice with me (& allow me to paraphrase...) "I have never done anything that I don't enjoy. If you do things that you enjoy, you get good at it, you will be happy and the money will naturally come." Great life lesson & as a bonus, great yummy food too (I don't even know what Spanakopita is before today - the spinach with feta cheese in pastry tastes so good, for some weird reason, it tasted like a very mild version of my fav preserved Chinese veg 'Mui Choy', preserved mustard greens lol; & the Italian omelette is on point)!
P/S cash only though

originalText.text:
Mama Jo is such a sweetheart that the food didnâ€™t even had to be good - yet it is delicious! I had the Weekly Special and itâ€™s a full meal for a cheap price. The cinnamon donut was my favorite.

She also takes fun videos of costumers, you can check them at her Instagram profile!

originalText.text: I recently had the pleasure of trying Mama Jo's Breakfast Cart and it was amazing! The food was fresh and flavorful and the service was outstanding. The staff was friendly and accommodating and the prices were very reasonable. I highly recommend Mama Jo's Breakfast Cart for anyone looking for a delicious and affordable breakfast option.

text.text: I recently had the pleasure of trying Mama Jo's Breakfast Cart and it was amazing! The food was fresh and flavorful and the service was outstanding. The staff was friendly and accommodating and the prices were very reasonable. I highly recommend Mama Jo's Breakfast Cart for anyone looking for a delicious and affordable breakfast option.

originalText.text: I went to Mama Jo's close to closing time, but she still took care of me and made sure I was able to leave full. The bagel sandwiches are amazing, and the pastries were delicious as well. Plus, you can't beat her prices. Highly recommend!
